example.text: Today we hear directly from the CEOs of the three failed banks, SVB, Signature, and First Republic. These executives lined their pockets with millions of dollars in compensation and bonuses while running these banks into the ground - to the detriment of hardworking Americans. [[url]]
We aren’t having just an #InfrastructureWeek, it’s an #InfrastructureDecade. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law passed last Congress has already funded 32,000 projects across 4,500 communities.

#OnThisDay in 1960 the FDA approved the first birth control pill. 63 years later, it's more important than ever that every American has access to contraception and reproductive health care.
